ComicInfo.Summary:
The mind-bending terror of the Elder Gods has infested countless universes. Reality, and humanity itself, hang in the balance. Now it all comes down the final battle. C.V.O. is scattered across America, and one of their own may be the key to stoping the threat once and for all—but not without a tremendous sacrifice. Danger Girl and others are on hand to help, but will it be enough?
General Notes
Bumblebee, Raphael and Snake-Eyes appear only on cover.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-26 16:20:26. [CVDB329413]
ComicInfo.Characters: Abbey Chase, Amanda Houellebecq, Benny, Bools, Britt, Bumblebee, Cross, Raphael, Snake Eyes
ComicInfo.Teams: CVO: Covert Vampiric Operations, Elder Gods
ComicInfo.Locations: Providence, Rhode Island, Rhode Island, Russia, San Francisco, St. Petersburg, Texas
